steps.title: Draw a slightly slanted vertical oval for the head.
steps.content: Draw a slightly slanted vertical oval for the head. Draw it lightly because you'll need to erase it afterwards.

steps.title: Draw a longer horizontal oval below (yet intersecting) the first one.
steps.content: Draw a longer horizontal oval below (yet intersecting) the first one.

steps.title: As a guide for the ears, draw two medium sized ovals on top of the first oval.
steps.content: As a guide for the ears, draw two medium sized ovals on top of the first oval. Make it slimmer and slightly slanting as well.

steps.title: Draw a small oval below to serve as the neck, followed by a bigger oval for the torso.
steps.content: Draw a small oval below to serve as the neck, followed by a bigger oval for the torso.

steps.title: Add circles for his shoulders and joints; ovals for his arms.
steps.content: Add circles for his shoulders and joints; ovals for his arms.

steps.title: Draw pairs of stretched ovals to form his legs and feet.
steps.content: Draw pairs of stretched ovals to form his legs and feet.

steps.title: Using these guide shapes, trace the outline of Coyote's head.
steps.content: Using these guide shapes, trace the outline of Coyote's head.

steps.title: Continue tracing Coyote's outline.
steps.content: Continue tracing Coyote's outline. don't forget to add a fluffy tail at his backside.

steps.title: Add more details.
steps.content: Add more details.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing as desired.
steps.content: Color the drawing as desired.

steps.title: Draw a circle for the head.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the head.

steps.title: Draw another sphere below and behind the first circle to serve as its neck.
steps.content: Draw another sphere below and behind the first circle to serve as its neck.

steps.title: Draw a U-shaped curve on the first circle, with its bottom pointing diagonally to the right.
steps.content: Draw a U-shaped curve on the first circle, with its bottom pointing diagonally to the right. This will serve as the coyote's nose.

steps.title: Remove unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Remove unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Draw a larger oval below and behind the second oval.
steps.content: Draw a larger oval below and behind the second oval. This will serve as its body.

steps.title: Below the large oval, draw stretched ovals for its legs.
steps.content: Below the large oval, draw stretched ovals for its legs. The front pairs straight and the back pairs with joints. Add circles below for the feet.

steps.title: Using the guide lines as reference, draw the outline and ears of the coyote's head (To make a furry impression, use zigzag lines).
steps.content: Using the guide lines as reference, draw the outline and ears of the coyote's head (To make a furry impression, use zigzag lines). Below the largest oval near the farthest leg, trace a slightly wavy line to as a guide for the tail.

steps.title: In-between the ears, draw three vertical lines going down towards the nose.
steps.content: In-between the ears, draw three vertical lines going down towards the nose. Draw a horizontal line intersecting these three lines to serve as guides where to place the eyes.

steps.title: Using the above guide lines, draw details of its eyes, nose, mouth, etc.
steps.content: Using the above guide lines, draw details of its eyes, nose, mouth, etc.

steps.title: Add inside details of the coyote's ears.
steps.content: Add inside details of the coyote's ears.

steps.title: Begin tracing the front of the coyote's body and legs.
steps.content: Begin tracing the front of the coyote's body and legs.

steps.title: Continue tracing the rest of the coyote's body, legs and tail.
steps.content: Continue tracing the rest of the coyote's body, legs and tail.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Add further "furry" details by using small line dashes.
steps.content: Add further "furry" details by using small line dashes.

steps.title: Color the drawing as desired.
steps.content: Color the drawing as desired.
